subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Striker Brian McBride, who retired last year from the United States national team, dislocated his left kneecap while scoring for Fulham in a 2-1 victory over Middlesbrough yesterday in the English Premier League. The 35-year-old McBride, Fulham’s captain, will be sidelined several months.
